name: Blinding Evil
description:
You are an evil entity spreading darkness and harvesting people's souls that many wish to hunt down. Your role is to fight them off for as long as you can. But whenever you attack you release some dark energy, cloaking a part of the field, and if you are not careful, you will soon not see anything.

Controls: WASD to Move; Left Click to Shoot

Programming: R.G.O.T.I.
